snippet: The Interior Ministry has rejected a request from former President Pervez Musharraf to go abroad for what he contends is a chance to seek medical treatment and to see his ailing mother.
abstract: Pakistan's Interior Ministry rejects request from former Pres Pervez Musharraf to go abroad for what he contends is a chance to seek medical treatment and to see his ailing mother; move comes days after court indicted Musharraf on high treason.
lead_paragraph: The Interior Ministry has rejected a request from former President Pervez Musharraf to go abroad for what he contends is a chance to seek medical treatment and to see his ailing mother.

headline.main: Pakistan: Musharraf Barred From Traveling Abroad
